max_article_index.map: function (doc) { for(var n = 0; n < doc.indices.length; n++) { emit(doc.indices[n].indices_KEY, parseInt(doc.indices[n].indices, 10)); }}
max_article_index.reduce: function (key, values, rereduce) { return Math.max.apply({}, values); }

min_article_index.map: function (doc) { for(var n = 0; n < doc.indices.length; n++) { emit(doc.indices[n].indices_KEY, parseInt(doc.indices[n].indices, 10)); }}
min_article_index.reduce: function (key, values, rereduce) { return Math.min.apply({}, values); }
